user.name: Ibraguim Albakov
user.bio: After three years of professional experience, I undertook a career change by learning the C and C++ programming languages, later expanding my skills to include Dart and Python as well as various web frameworks. Driven by a constantly renewed curiosity, I have also developed a growing interest in the intersections between programming and economics, striving to deepen my knowledge in these complementary fields.
